belongs_to_collection.name: Spicy Beauty Queen of Bangkok Collection

original_title: ปล้นนะยะ 2 อั๊ยยยย่ะ
overview: In the crime records, year of 2003, there was the oddest bank robbery case ever. The bank robbers were dressed in full sets of cabaret costumes. Now one of them who is in jail is about to be set free. This time she and her new robber gang are setting up plans to rob the money in a rich man's house.
tagline: A new armed robbery plan was set.
title: Spicy Robbery
